SEARCH

Interface DataReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVReader
public interface DataReader
Interface to read data from a file. Allows generalization of reading multiple file types.
Since:
2023-11-24
Version:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<String>
    performRead(String fileName)
    Abstract method to read data from a file.

  • Method Details

    • performRead

      ArrayList<String> performRead(String fileName)
      Abstract method to read data from a file. To be implemented by classes that implement this interface.
      Parameters:
      fileName - Name of the file to be read from.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Strings containing the data read from the file. Each string in the ArrayList represents a line in the file.
